aeneas.controllers

Class ManipulatePieceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • aeneas.controllers.ManipulatePieceController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent>

    public class ManipulatePieceController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent>
    single click rotates CW, Shift-click rotates CCW ctrl-click flips across vertical axis, shift-ctrl-click flips across horizontal axis
